ygData.subject: Re: Weird thing that happens when I cast mesmorize
ygData.msgSnippet: I guess I missed the window wherein mesmerize wasn t considered an attack spell by nearby mobs...
ygData.messageBody:
I guess I missed the window wherein mesmerize wasn't considered an attack
spell by nearby mobs...

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Miller, Keith A. [SMTP:keithm@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 3:56 PM
> To: 'eqenchanters@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Weird thing that happens when I cast
> mesmorize
>
> From: "Miller, Keith A." <keithm@...>
>
> Well, thats the way I suspect it should work. Too bad, guess its back to
> the risky soothe <hurry> soothe <hurry> pull routine. I would not ever
> try
> to soothe more than 2 mobs, unles you enjoy a whole camp jumping on you.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: scott@... [mailto:scott@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 3:50 PM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Weird thing that happens when I cast mesmorize
>
>
> From: scott@...
>
> Previously when I casted it, the monster would just stand and no other
> monsters would react.
>
> Recently though, when I cast it and there are other monsters around, they
> come running while the mesmorized one just stands there.
>
> Anyone know why that happens?
>
> Azboklin the enchanter
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------

> ...ONElist is THE place where the world talks!

> What was YOUR favorite part?!
